error.message: Parameter $constantContactFieldService of method Drupal\constant_contact_block\Form\ConstantContactForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\constant_contact_block\services\ConstantContactFieldsInterface. Deprecated in 8.x-1.0-beta6 and to be removed in 8.x-2.0.

Parameter $constantContactFieldService of method Drupal\constant_contact_block\Plugin\Block\ConstantContactBlock::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\constant_contact_block\services\ConstantContactFieldsInterface. Deprecated in 8.x-1.0-beta6 and to be removed in 8.x-2.0.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to constant_contact_block.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
